[bq="hype"]i still dont understand the appeal of japan

like, okay you're a weeb and everything and i get that but, like

tokyo isn't too much different than nyc or any other big western city[/bq]
The point is that it's a very different culture with a different sense of aesthetics and ways of thinking. And it's interesting to see and learn

"@Carcass Strife":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552c488f63687204c6c30b00#post_552c488f63687204c6c30b00
[bq="Carcass Strife"]!http://i.imgur.com/ei2Tmv3.gif!
I think I found Gizoid's dog.[/bq]
The department of defense is looking at making essentially GECKOS from metal gear because one of the biggest weaknesses of tanks or vehicles is that they can't climb mountains.

The reason why the Afghanistan war took so fucking long was that the Taliban knew this and took advantage of it.  The reason why they're developing walking robots is that we really don't want to ever get caught with our pants down again.

"@Number1pegasus":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/552c53c96368721813fc0a00#post_552c53c96368721813fc0a00
Joking aside I'm glad to see that monster girls are becoming more popular.  You know how back in the day cat girls and such were becoming popular?  Well it's pretty much following the same trend; it's starting out as hentai, now it's moving onto manga and now it's moving into anime and video games.
